tool_description: API Name: OpenTow - Towing Company Management API
name: Auto Tow API
title: Auto Tow API

api_list.name: Destroy Vehicle
api_list.description: Permanently destroy vehicle, or permanently transfer to third party (i.e. auction).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://auto-tow-api.p.rapidapi.com/DestroyVehicle/vehicle identifier"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "auto-tow-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://auto-tow-api.p.rapidapi.com/DestroyVehicle/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "auto-tow-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Release vehicle
api_list.description: Release vehicle from storage , or return from third party to owner.

        }

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Recover Vehicle
api_list.description: Mark a vehicle as recovered, and moved to storage or third party.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://auto-tow-api.p.rapidapi.com/RecoverVehicle/vehicle identifier"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "auto-tow-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: newVehicle
api_list.description: Add a new vehicle to be recovered
